Query.Sql:
with records as ( select PatientSer, ProcedureCode, ActualStartDateTime_s as Start_date, ActualEndDateTime_s as End_date from omop_staging.rtds_2a_attendances
union
select PatientSer, ProcedureCode, Start_date, End_date from omop_staging.rtds_2b_plan ), records_with_patient as ( select (select top 1 PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = r.PatientSer) as PatientId, r.* from records r ) select PatientId, ProcedureCode, Start_date as event_start_date, End_date as event_end_date from records_with_patient where PatientId is not null and patientid not like '%[^0-9]%'
